subject: ANT and JUNIT - specifying individual tests in a suite
msgSnippet: Is there a way to specify in the ANT build.xml target for junit, that certain test methods in a TestCase class should be executed.  I have several test methods

Is there a way to specify in the ANT build.xml target for junit, that 
certain test methods in a TestCase class should be executed.  I have 
several test methods in a TestCase that need to be executed several 
times and in the proper order.  I was looking at the ANT 
documentation on <batchtests> and the fileset node can only indicate 
classes, not a list of tests that should go into a TestSuite.

Thanks for help.

Paul Antinori
